failure.message:
`cy.request()` failed on:
https://conduit.productionready.io/api/articles/
The response we received from your web server was:
> 422: Unprocessable Entity
This was considered a failure because the status code was not `2xx` or `3xx`.
If you do not want status codes to cause failures pass the option: `failOnStatusCode: false`
-----------------------------------------------------------
The request we sent was:
Method: POST URL: https://conduit.productionready.io/api/articles/ Headers: { "Connection": "keep-alive", "Authorization": "Token eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJlbWFpbCI6Imtvc3Rhc3NpYXNpb3MxOTk5QGdtYWlsLmNvbSIsInVzZXJuYW1lIjoia1NpYXNpb3MiLCJpYXQiOjE2NTEyMzM2MTAsImV4cCI6MTY1NjQxNzYxMH0.WMJxRuRcXmMBo5iqVr087EXWLME2el2EGTj-olrj9tc", "user-agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) HeadlessChrome/101.0.4951.41 Safari/537.36", "accept": "*/*", "accept-encoding": "gzip, deflate", "content-type": "application/json", "content-length": 164, "referer": "https://conduit.productionready.io/api/articles/" } Body: {"article":{"tagList":[],"title":"Request from API","description":"This article is about requests from api.","body":"Requests from api are invisible to the user."}} Redirects: [ "307: https://api.realworld.io/api/articles/" ]
-----------------------------------------------------------
The response we got was:
Status: 422 - Unprocessable Entity Headers: { "date": "Fri, 29 Apr 2022 12:00:11 GMT", "content-type": "application/json; charset=utf-8", "content-length": "39", "connection": "keep-alive", "x-powered-by": "Express", "access-control-allow-origin": "*", "etag": "W/\"27-BNeuaWQ7DHvW/r+pl+qdJiF06Is\"", "via": "1.1 vegur", "cf-cache-status": "DYNAMIC", "expect-ct": "max-age=604800, report-uri=\"https://report-uri.cloudflare.com/cdn-cgi/beacon/expect-ct\"", "report-to": "{\"endpoints\":[{\"url\":\"https:\\/\\/a.nel.cloudflare.com\\/report\\/v3?s=WgN4uuE025JGvlNWD%2FljnlO17eBXa5wJr9VTCHposgi6H%2FWMiJOP7KA5UvaONgSviwUwEx6KIFCl8VzAx36esLt5ETX6QOgrVrdrMxNjpFx3fkVf5hd4hR%2BW%2BuCpMgX1aVvEwROPvQtXjB%2B2smug\"}],\"group\":\"cf-nel\",\"max_age\":604800}", "nel": "{\"success_fraction\":0,\"report_to\":\"cf-nel\",\"max_age\":604800}", "server": "cloudflare", "cf-ray": "7037e0390b3c91db-FRA", "alt-svc": "h3=\":443\"; ma=86400, h3-29=\":443\"; ma=86400" } Body: { "errors": { "title": [ "must be unique" ] } }
https://on.cypress.io/request
